event.title: Several decades later Juan Pardo recorded

data.event: Several decades later Juan Pardo recorded his observation of a predominant Native American tribe, later confirmed to be the Catawba, in the vicinity of present-day Fort Mill, east of the Catawba River.
The Province of South Carolina was founded in 1670.

event.title: Twelve years later it was divided

data.event: Twelve years later it was divided into three counties.
